StreamingCallback Class Reference
[Auxiliary]

#include <Apoxi/Auxiliary/StreamingCallback.hpp>


Public Member Functions

virtual void Callback (StreamingInfo &info)=0
virtual void CallbackRead (StreamingReadInfo &read_info)=0
virtual void CallbackWrite (StreamingWriteInfo &write_info)=0
 StreamingCallback ()
virtual ~StreamingCallback ()

Detailed Description

StreamingCallback is a generic interface for components receiving the callbacks of streaming operations. For a read operation the CallbackRead, for a write operation the CallbackWrite, and for all other operations, e.g. opening, closing, etc., the Callback method is called.

The callbacks sends various information about the streaming operation, in particular, the state of operation, the data of read and write operations, error messages and the like.

See also:
StreamingInfo, StreamingReadInfo, StreamingWriteInfo
